.. _singularity_oci_start:

singularity oci start
---------------------

Start container process (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Start invoke start operation to start a previously created container 
  identified by container ID.

::

  singularity oci start <container_ID>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity oci start mycontainer

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for start

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity oci <singularity_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 12-Oct-2021*
